TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content:
After being told that a post I made belongs in General Discussion I made another in the GD

this is the original

Can you please lock it or delete it

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116217-Valentina-s-Future?p=1851828#post1851828
War Eagle 1, I locked it for you, but I can't delete it as there are other users' posts in there.

You know, this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116212-Help-requested-Docking-port-error-spam would probably go better in the Support [modded] section, you think? Yes it's my thread and I'm trying to find out what is behind that error spam that only appears to afflict that particular craft.
Moved for you, smjjames. If you could edit the post and go advanced to add the proper prefix it would help people trying to diagnose the problem.

Sure and thanks.

Edited April 22, 2015 by smjjames
Please close, thank you.
As requested
Transfer ownership to another user (please PM me for who to transfer it to)

Can I get this moved to addon releases please.

Thanks in advance

Transfer ownership to another user (please PM me for who to transfer it to)

Not necessary. No one "owns" a thread, and that thread is in little danger of dying. Best of luck with whatever is drawing you away, hope you make it back someday.

Can I get this moved to addon releases please.

Thanks in advance

Moved. I had to snip the download link until you add the license to both your download package and the thread OP, feel free to put it back when you have done so.

Per OP's Request open this on the day of 1.0?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50186-The-kerbal-time-capsule-project
I've got it bookmarked - thanks!
Would like THIS thread locked, please. No responses and I've already basically fulfilled the purpose of it already.
All locked up, Maximus97.
Thanks a million!

(optional) Sticky this thread so if it gets put on the second page (somehow) people can find it?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114646-Official-1-0-MEGA-Hype-Thread%21

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116551-Logitech-Extreme-3D-Pro-throttle-problem-Please-Delete?p=1859824#post1859824

I made it, then found my problem almost immediately after. It wasn't even a problem, just be consistently overlooking something...
It's gone, Dman1791.

(optional) Sticky this thread so if it gets put on the second page (somehow) people can find it?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114646-Official-1-0-MEGA-Hype-Thread%21

We will not be sticking this thread.

Please lock this thread, the question has been answered and most people are not able to read so it might turn into spamfest.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116616-Dres-and-the-whole-asteroid-thing
All locked up, lajoswinkler.

Can I get the threads for the following 5 mods I created (Analog Control, SAS Reset, Dynamic Deflection, Sane Strategies, and SemiSat reaction wheels) closed please. Post 1.0 I will be collecting all the smaller plugins into a single thread so I can maintain them a bit easier (they were all created at vastly different times, so a thread merge would be rather confusing IMO). I've already left a note in the OP of all 5 threads.

Thanks in advance

Edited April 26, 2015 by Crzyrndm

Locked up.

I have a question,

Can I stop posts on a thread from counting to a person's post count on this thread, like in forum games? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113844-The-great-forum-test-thread%21

Some people have asked about it.

Thanks in advance,

-MRScientist

I have a question,

Can I stop posts on a thread from counting to a person's post count on this thread, like in forum games? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113844-The-great-forum-test-thread%21

Some people have asked about it.

Thanks in advance,

-MRScientist

I believe that's a per-subforum setting, can't be done with individual threads. It's not that big a deal, post count really doesn't matter.
